items.q: How much tech expertise do I need to use VTAC MANAGER?
items.a: If you can play a mobile game or use social media, you can use VTAC. Our system is built on Gamification principles, making it intuitive for veteran coaches and young athletes (Gen Z/Alpha) to master within minutes.

items.q: Does the system require any special hardware?
items.a: No special equipment is needed. VTAC is a cloud-based platform that works on tablets, smartphones, and computers. For the best tactical briefing experience, we recommend using an iPad or a Smartboard.

items.q: Is my data safe with the Unified Login? Can other coaches see my tactics?
items.a: Privacy is our priority. Even with a single login, all tactical data and statistics are strictly isolated by team. Coaches can only access information for the specific rosters they are authorized to manage.

items.q: How is a player’s Digital CV handled if they move between teams?
items.a: Statistics are stored based on "Team History." Achievements in Team A remain distinct from Team B, but everything is compiled into a Verified Digital Timeline on the player’s central profile—perfect for scholarship applications or pro scouts.

items.q: What if the pitch is unavailable due to bad weather or unexpected closures?
items.a: "The training ground is wherever you are." With VTAC’s Remote Coaching, development never stops. You can host virtual tactical sessions from anywhere, ensuring your team stays prepared regardless of field conditions.

items.q: How does the Remote Interactive system work for players?
items.a: It’s as simple as scanning a QR code. Players use their smartphones to join a "Virtual Pitch," where they can see real-time tactical movements and interact with the play as if they were standing on the grass.

items.q: Will interactive training be boring for the team?
items.a: Quite the opposite. By turning tactical drills into a gamified experience, players stay engaged and challenged. It builds Team Bonding and turns complex learning into a fun, collaborative activity that everyone looks forward to.
